quote_first: “I stopped at Mom’s classroom for the last few minutes of lunch. I closed the door behind me and sat down at a desk opposite her. I glanced up at the clock on the wall.
quote_last: . I had six minutes. I didn’t want more.”
title: Turtles All the Way Down
author: John Green

quote_first: The numbers on the clock changed silently, advanced to
title: Replay
author: Kim Grimwood

quote_last: Lamont and Jackie had joined the team in the canteen for lunch, where the babble of expectant chatter revealed how eager they all were to get on with the job.
title: Nothing Ventured
author: Jeffrey Archer
